articles.title: When the Penguins have an emergency, they call on someone from N.S. It's not who you think | CBC News
articles.description: Mike Chiasson, from Cole Harbour, N.S., is an emergency backup goalie for the NHL's Pittsburgh Penguins. The former Acadia Axemen is lifelong friends with one of Cole Harbour's other famous hockey players: Sidney Crosby.
